TutorialScript.TutorialStep: This is Doug. Doug originally had big plans for Prom Week, and is kind of alarmed to discover it's already Thursday.
Doug's got a crush on his friend Chloe... would it be weird to ask her to be his Prom Date?
But then again, he's got more in common with that skater chick Jordan... and he heard she totally digs him.
Then there's Oswald. The preppies and skaters have never really gotten along. Should Doug try to bury the hatchet... or finally take a stand against the jerks?
There's ten minutes before school starts... better get started!
